Job Title: Job Cost Accountant- Construction

Location: Salt Lake City, UT

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Job Title: Job Cost Accountant

Job Location: Salt Lake City, UT

Salary: $60,000 - $90,000 + Bonus

Requirements: 3+ Years Experience

If you are a Construction Accountant with experience, please read on!

We are looking for a motivated individual to join our fast-growing commercial GC construction team. Since 2001, we have expanded our business from a custom home builder to one of the largest commercial general contractors in Utah! We have several projects lined up in the next few years and need someone that shares our idea that planning and communication are key in making sure our projects get done on time and within budget.

We are hiring a Job Cost Accountant in the Salt Lake City area so if you are interested in joining a company that focuses on serving the community and building a better one all while ensuring a healthy work-life balance and employee appreciation, then apply immediately!

What You Will Be Doing

be responsible for maintaining the company's Job Costing System and Job Costing Policies and Procedures. The JCA will work closely with and report to the VP of Finance to ensure sound accounting, control, and contract administration practices are being properly followed. JCA will assist the Project Manager (PM) in successfully managing the financial functions of a project including accounts receivable, accounts payable, project cash flow, and project financial closeout. JCA must be a detailed, self-motivated team player, have a good work ethic and positive attitude. JCA will ensure they are following all company policies, procedures, and guidelines at all times.

What You Need for this Position

 3+ years of experience in accounting Experience in QuickBooks Experience in Microsoft Excel

What's In It for You

 Salary: $60k-$90K + Bonuses 401k match after 1 year Cell phone and Laptop Medical/Dental/Vision 3 weeks PTO and holidays

So, if you are a Construction Accountant with experience, please apply today!

Benefits

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Email Your Resume In Word To

Stevie.Schrader@CyberCoders.com

Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : SS22-1796052 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***

Stevie Schrader - Recruiter - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, status as a crime victim, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. CyberCoders will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. CyberCoders is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you need special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please contact a member of our Human Resources team to make arrangements.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
